H0.text: What number is Hurricane on the Beaufort Scale. 8

H1.text: What number is Hurricane on the Beaufort Scale. 9

H2.text: What number is Hurricane on the Beaufort Scale. 10

H3.text: What number is Hurricane on the Beaufort Scale. 12

A4.text: Hurricane Force Warnings are issued if winds of greater than 64 knots are expected.

A5.text: Using this formula the highest winds in hurricanes would be 23 in the scale.
